sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per encounter, the character may take the Makashi Flourish action, making an Average (♦ ♦ 2 purple d8) Lightsaber (Presence) check. If it is successful, one engaged opponent suffers strain equal to successes (ignoring soak), and the character recovers an equal amount of strain. The character may also spend 3 advantages or 1 triumph generated on the check to stagger the opponent until the end of the target's next turn.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Makashi flourish</name> <number>TAL0001077</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 03:55:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4aa0ec78db224c542901de90cf961945</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 03:55:01</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
